column4: i am running easy webcam to detect my webcam - but it just seems to hang. is this normal?
try it on A-MSN there it should work
try what on aMSN? the webcam? it doesn't work on amsn
yes i did - but it is hanging
creative, it was working fine, and then i installed something on linux and then it stopped working
then un install that program you've installed
i installed loads - not sure which it was :S
we can't help you if you are not specivic
ok but how can i reinstall my webcam?
type in console: sudo apt-get remove easycam2
then type: sudo apt-get install easycam2
i did that but it still hangs
it must be one of the programs or elite tools you got with disturbs the webcam
is there a log which tells me what i have installed lately and how etc?
